description:

Hardcover book from 1974

Broken down into six chapters : 

1 / The Celluloid Scream
2 / The Monster Industry
3 / Sex and the Vampire
4 / Creature Symbols
5 / The Machine Takes Over
6 / The Dark Stairs

Amazing photographs in both color and black & white, as well as tidbits and deeper looks into classic Horror & Fantasy movies from the 1950s-70s.

description:
SO GOOD.

Hardcover, 1993.

Seven different chapters:

1 / Intro
2 / Stitches, Tips, & Techniques
3 / Pullovers
4 / Cardigans
5 / Summer Wear
6 / Children's Wear
7 / Index & Bibliography

Amazing sweaters for both ladies & kids!

description:
